name: Wireless Headphones Pro
description: Premium wireless headphones with active noise cancellation, deep bass, and long-lasting battery life for everyday use.

name: Smart Fitness Watch
description: Advanced fitness tracking watch featuring heart-rate monitoring, sleep tracking, and customizable workout modes.

name: Minimal Desk Lamp
description: Modern LED desk lamp with adjustable brightness and color temperature, designed for productivity and comfort.

name: Ergonomic Office Chair
description: Comfort-focused office chair with lumbar support, breathable mesh back, and adjustable height settings.

name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: Compact Bluetooth speaker delivering rich sound, waterproof design, and up to 12 hours of playtime.

name: Mechanical Keyboard
description: High-performance mechanical keyboard with tactile switches, RGB backlighting, and durable aluminum frame.

name: Ultra HD Monitor
description: 27-inch Ultra HD monitor with vibrant colors, high refresh rate, and slim bezels for immersive viewing.

name: Noise-Canceling Earbuds
description: True wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation, crystal-clear audio, and fast charging support.

name: Smart Home Assistant
description: Voice-controlled smart assistant for home automation, reminders, music streaming, and real-time updates.

name: Portable Power Bank
description: High-capacity power bank with fast charging support, compact design, and multiple device compatibility.

name: Smart LED Light Kit
description: Customizable smart LED lighting kit with app control, color presets, and voice assistant integration.

name: Compact Digital Camera
description: Lightweight digital camera offering high-resolution photos, optical zoom, and easy portability.

name: Adjustable Standing Desk
description: Height-adjustable standing desk designed to improve posture, productivity, and workspace flexibility.

name: Gaming Mouse Pro
description: Precision gaming mouse with customizable DPI, ergonomic design, and programmable buttons.

name: Premium Laptop Sleeve
description: Slim and durable laptop sleeve made with water-resistant materials for everyday protection.
